price: 31. (Fircoon) wuxuu yidhi: La imow, haddaad run sheegi.
arabic: قَالَ فَأۡتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla fati bihi in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
